TITLE: Episode 109 - Between Two Towers with Monica Perez [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by our good friend from the Propaganda Report, Monica Perez. Right after the 20th anniversary of 9/11, we will reminisce, talk about what happened that day, grapple with the official story, and make several dirty jokes. Join us for a great time.
